Waitlist

Check out my upcoming builds list. They are in a “first come, first served” basis, with the first being my immediate priority to get shipped, and then getting gradually less urgent as you go down the list. I start working on a build as soon as its ordered, sourcing the woods and hardware, doing rough cuts on the body etc, so if you’re guitar is a long way down the list, don’t despair, it has been started, but it’s probably not getting its last coat of oil yet!

If you have placed an order and your guitar isn’t on the list then it means either it’s done, and I’m arranging the final payment and shipping, or you’ve not paid a holding deposit yet.

  1. Will (Raleigh, United States): Mahogany S type with bubinga neck and wenge fretboard. 2 firebird mini humbuckers.

  2. Nuno (Airdrie, Scotland): Wenge Wayfair bass. 2x2 headstock, passive piezo and 2 humbuckers

  3. Johan (Jakarta, Indonesia): Morty, ash body, maple neck and rosewood fretboard. classic pickups

  4. Philippe (New York, United States): Wenge Wayfair bass. 3 mini rail humbuckers, 6 way switch, gold hardware, reverse headstock

  5. Sof (Cheltenham, Australia): Wenge Wayfair, overwound humbuckers, gold hardware, bigsby, cream binding, 6 way switch, custom inlay, reverse headstock

  6. Arne (Odense, Denmark): Wenge Offset Wayfair, custom "F" hole, p90 neck, humbucker bridge, reverse headstock

  7. Julian (Sarasota, Florida): Epi(c) rebuild. hollow body, bubinga back, Duesenberg trem, p90 neck, humbucker bridge.

  8. Josh (Rohnert Park, United States): Wenge hollow Offset, Wenge neck, maple fretboard, 3 p90s, floating ebony bridge

  9. Christian (Erie, United States): Single cut walnut Wayfair. Mahogany neck, ebony fretboard. Jazzmaster trem, Jaguar single coils. F hole binding

  10. Genchi (Sazuka, Japan): Wenge Wayfair, 2 single coils & p90 bridge, cream binding, ebony floating bridge, left handed, 24 frets

  11. John (Sussex, England): Mahogany Wayfair, mahogany neck, wenge fretboard. 2 p90s. Jazzmaster trem

  12. Paul (Copenhagen, Denmark): Walnut Wayfair, Rosewood neck, ebony board. 2 mini humbuckers and passive piezo circuit, cream binding

  13. Will (Denver ): Cedar Wayfair. Baritone with 28" scale length, 2 P90s and a jazzmaster trem.

  14. Jake (Hanover, USA): 5 string long scale solid body bass. 2 jazz bass pickups, alder body, maple neck, wenge board

  15. Nick Greer (Athens, USA): All wenge Morty. Single P90 bridge. Single volume.

  16. Aria (Copenhagen ): Wenge Explorer, aka ExMoarer. Single humbucker, single volume.

  17. Matt (Uppsala, Sweden ): Offset Flying V, single Humbucker, single volume. Maximum metal.

  18. Eli (Colorado, USA): Classic Morty. Swamp Ash body, maple neck, rosewood fretboard. 2 medium vintage voiced pickups.

  19. Thomas (Aarhus, Denmark): all Bubinga Offset, 2 humbuckers. Left handed

  20. Kasper (Canada ): Walnut Offset, p90 neck, mini humbucker bridge, jazzmaster trem, floating bridge.

  21. Joe (Brighton, UK): Wenge Wayfair shortscale bass. 3 B90s, no F holes.

  22. Tyler (Michigan, USA): Roasted maple wayfair, roasted redwood neck, ebony fretboard. Tele lipstick neck, p90 bridge.

  23. Jeff (South Carolina, USA): Roasted swamp ash Wayfair. Roasted maple neck, ebony board. Bound F holes and top, p90 neck, humbucker Bridge. Bigsby

  24. Will (London, England ): All wenge hollow morty with black binding. 8 string baritone. P90 neck, firebird bridge.
